alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:23AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 800 AM MST... At 722 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Creek, or 11 miles east of New River, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Horseshoe Reservoir, and Seven Springs. This includes AZ Interstate 17 near mile marker 233. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River
